oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Betty McComas
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mrs. Betty McComas, Director of Nursing Education, holding a copy of The Health Careers Subcommittee: Organization, Function. A handwritten note in the top, right corner of the manual reads "Nursing Education Office, Do Not Remove." In the background is a Books on Nursing display and a booklet titled A New Career... U.S. Army Nurse Corps.
